MtkPathTimeRangeToOrbitList.c

00002 =                                                                           =
00003 =                       MtkPathTimeRangeToOrbitList                         =
00004 =                                                                           =
00005 =============================================================================
00006 
00007                          Jet Propulsion Laboratory

00011             Copyright 2005, California Institute of Technology.
00012                            ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
00013                  U.S. Government Sponsorship acknowledged.
00014 
00015 ============================================================================*/
00016 
00017 #include "MisrOrbitPath.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include <math.h>
00020 #include <stdlib.h>
00021 #include <string.h>
00022 
00040 MTKt_status MtkPathTimeRangeToOrbitList(
00041   int path, 
00042   const char *start_time, 
00043   const char *end_time, 
00044   int *orbitcnt, 
00045   int **orbitlist  )
00046 {
00047   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return code of this function */
00048   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00049   int start_orbit;
00050   int start_path;
00051   int end_orbit;
00052   int end_path;
00053   int i;
00054   int num_orbits;
00055   int num_paths = 0;
00056   int ret_path;
00057   int *olist = NULL;
00058 
00059   if (path < 1 || path > 233)
00060     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00061 
00062   if (start_time == NULL || end_time == NULL || orbitcnt == NULL ||
00063       orbitlist == NULL)
00064     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00065 
00066   status = MtkTimeToOrbitPath(start_time,&start_orbit,&start_path);
00067   if (status == MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT)
00068   {
00069     status = MtkTimeToOrbitPath("2000-03-03T00:00:00Z",&start_orbit,&start_path);
00070     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00071   }
00072   else if (status != MTK_SUCCESS)
00073     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(status)  
00074 
00075   status = MtkTimeToOrbitPath(end_time,&end_orbit,&end_path);
00076   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status)
00077 
00078   if (start_orbit > end_orbit)
00079     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00080 
00081   num_orbits = end_orbit - start_orbit + 1;
00082   olist = (int*)malloc((size_t)ceil(num_orbits / 233.0) * sizeof(int));
00083   if (olist == NULL)
00084     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00085 
00086   for (i = 0; i < num_orbits; ++i)
00087   {
00088     status = MtkOrbitToPath(start_orbit + i,&ret_path);
00089     if (status != MTK_SUCCESS)
00090       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(status);
00091 
00092     if (ret_path == path)
00093       olist[num_paths++] = start_orbit + i;
00094   }
00095 
00096   *orbitlist = (int*)malloc(num_paths * sizeof(int));
00097   if (*orbitlist == NULL)
00098     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00099 
00100   *orbitcnt = num_paths;
00101 
00102   memcpy(*orbitlist,olist,num_paths * sizeof(int));
00103 
00104   free(olist);
00105 
00106   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00107 
00108 ERROR_HANDLE:
00109   if (olist != NULL)
00110     free(olist);
00111 
00112   return status_code;
00113 }
